start:
Hello ,
to get started send /help
or start searching for a band by sending /searchband

about the bot : /about
Change language : /lang
Follow @MetalArchives to get updates!
help:
***Commands :*** 

/searchband ___: search for a band by name___

/randomband ___: get a random band___ 

/lang ___: change language of the bot___ 

/about: ___shows some info about bot___

 /help ___: Help!___

Got questions? feel free to ask me @SieveR
search_band:
Ok, send me something to search like :

***Nevermore***
***Dream Theater***
its_old: Its old a bit, try a new search
about:
Its an open srouce telegram bot for [Encyclopaedia Metallum](https://www.metal-archives.com) written in nodejs using [telegraf](http://telegraf.js.org). All of the data are extracted from www.metal-archives.com . you can contact me via @SieveR .

***Dev Channel:*** @MetalArchives
***Developer:*** @SieveR 
***Github Repo:*** [metalarchives-telegram-bot](https://github.com/amiralies/metalarchives-telegram-bot)
